text: ryy puok anak niyeay tha tampit chidaunchitea robsa puok yeung ban thveu shi ri k tangpi moun mk meleah haey puok yeungokhnhom kreante chea kaunchaw chomnean kraoypi puokkeat bonnaoh . tae trong bamphlanh puok yeung daoy sar te puok del br pru td khosa( chomnean moun) thleab ban br pru td ryy
